item.title: useContext, useForm, and useFieldArray
item.description: I’m fortunate to have the opportunity to work with react-hook-form again. And work with it better. item.title: react-hook-form
item.description: It’s been a while since I last had the chance to assess several libraries to solve parts of a problem. My most recent project required me to evaluate JavaScript libraries which make form management a breeze. The “me” in the past would have jumped at any first possibility, like how a chick imprints on the first living thing they see. Not anymore. My ex-company taught me to set up decision tables and make recommendations according to concrete criteria and their priorities.
